description: Extra headers in xSEED data format

FDSN.description: Reserved extra headers defined by the FDSN

Time.description: Headers related to data timing and recording system clock

Quality.description: Timing quality.  A vendor specific value from 0 to 100% of maximum accuracy. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 1001, field 3]

Correction.description: Time correction applied to record start time in seconds. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 16]

LeapSecond.description: If present, one or more leap seconds occuring during this record.  The value specifies the number of leap seconds and direction.  For example, use 1 to specify a single positive leap second and -1 to specify a single negative leap second. [incorporates SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 12, bits 4 and 5]

Time.description: Time of timing exeption. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 500, field 4]

VCOCorrection.description: VCO correction, a percentage from 0 to 100% of VCO control value, where 0 is the slowest and 100 is the fastest.  [same as SEED 204 Blockette 500, field 3]

ReceptionQuality.description: Reception quality as a percent of maximum clock accuracy based only on information from the clock. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 500, field 6]

Count.description: Exception count, with meaning based on type of exception, such as 15 missing time marks.  [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 500, field 7]

Type.description: Description of clock exception, such as MISSING TIMEMARK. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 500, field 8]

ClockStatus.description: Description of clock status, clock specific parameters such as the station for an Omega clock or satellite signal to noise ratios for GPS clocks. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 500, field 10]

Event.description: Headers related to event detection and progression

Begin.description: An event starts in this record. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 12, bit 2]

End.description: An in-progress event ends in this record, i.e. the detection algorithm de-triggers. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 12, bit 3]

InProgress.description: An event is in progress. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 12, bit 6]

Type.description: Type of event detection, e.g. MURDOCK

SignalAmplitude.description: Event amplitude of signal in counts. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettews 200 and 201, field 3]

SignalPeriod.description: Event period of signal in seconds. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettews 200 and 201, field 4]

BackgroundEstimate.description: Event background estimate in counts. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettews 200 and 201, field 5]

Wave.description: Event detection wave, use values of DILATATION or COMPRESSION if determined. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettews 200 and 201, field 6, bit 0]

Units.description: Units of amplitude band background estimate, use COUNTS for unprocessed signal. [similar to SEED 2.4 Blockettews 200, field 6, bit 1]

OnsetTime.description: Event signal onset time. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettews 200 and 201, field 8]

MEDSNR.description: Murdock event detection signal-to-noise ratios. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 201, field 9]

MEDLookback.description: Murdock event detction lookback value: 0, 1 or 2. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 201, field 10]

MEDPickAlgorithm.description: Murdock event detection pick algorithm: 0 or 1. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 201, field 11]

Detector.description: Name of the event detector. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 200, field 9 and Blockette 201, field 12]

Type.description: Type of calibration: STEP, SINE, PSEUDORANDOM, GENERIC.

BeginTime.description: Calibration begin time. [similar to SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310,320,390, field 3]

EndTime.description: Calibration end time. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 395, field 3]

Steps.description: Number of step calibrations in sequence. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 300, field 4]

StepFirstPulsePositive.description: Step calibration, first pulse is positive. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 300, field 5, bit 0]

StepAlternateSign.description: Step calibration alternate sign.  [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300, field 5, bit 1]

Trigger.description: Calibration trigger, use AUTOMATIC or MANUAL. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310,320,390, field 5, bit 2]

Continued.description: Calibration is continued from previous records. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310,320,390, field 5, bit 3]

Amplitude.description: Amplitude of calibration signal.  For pseudo-random calibrations, this should be the peak-to-peak amplitude of the steps. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310, field 8 and Blockettes 320,390, field 7]

InputUnits.description: Units of calibration input, usually volts or amps. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 52, field 9]

AmplitudeRange.description: Amplitude range of calibration, use values of PEAKTOPEAK, ZEROTOPEAK, RMS OR RANDOM. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 310, field 5, bits 4,5,6 and Blockette 320, field 5, bit 4]

Duration.description: Duration of calibration in seconds. For step calibrations this is the duration of the step.  [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310,320,390, field 6]

SinePeriod.description: Period of sine calibrations in seconds. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 310, field 7]

StepBetween.description: Interval between times a step calibration is on in seconds. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 300, field 7]

InputChannel.description: Channel containing the calibration input. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310, field 9 and Blockettes 320,390, field 8]

ReferenceAmplitude.description: Reference amplitude.  This is a user-defined value that indicates either the voltage or amperage of the calibration signal when the calibrator is set to 0dB. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310, field 11 and Blockette 320, field 10]

Coupling.description: Coupling of the calibration signal, such as RESISTIVE or CAPACITIVE. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310, field 12 and Blockette 320, field 11]

Rolloff.description: Rolloff characteristics for any filters used on the calibrator, such as 3dB@10Hz.  [same as SEED 2.4 Blockettes 300,310, field 13 and Blockette 320, field 12]

Noise.description: Noise characteristics for pseudo-random calibrations, such as WHITE or RED. [same as SEED 2.4 Blockette 320, field 13]

Recenter.description: Headers related to sensor recentering (mass, gimble, etc.)

Type.description: Type of recenter: Mass, Gimbal, etc.  If omitted a mass recenter may be assumed.

Trigger.description: Calibration trigger, use AUTOMATIC or MANUAL.

MassPositionOffscale.description: Sensor mass position is offscale as defined by the vendor or operator.

AmplifierSaturation.description: Amplifier saturation detected. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 14, bit 0]

DigitizerClipping.description: Digitizer clipping detected. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 14, bit 1]

Spikes.description: Spikes detected. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 14, bit 2]

Glitches.description: Glitches detected. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 14, bit 3]

FilterCharging.description: A digital filter may be charging. [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 14, bit 6]

StationVolumeParityError.description: DEPRECATED Station volume parity error possibly present. [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 13, bit 0]

LongRecordRead.description: DEPRECATED Long record read (possibly no problem). [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 13, bit 1]

ShortRecordRead.description: DEPRECATED Short record read (record padded). [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 13, bit 2]

StartOfTimeSeries.description: DEPRECATED Start of time series. [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 13, bit 3]

EndOfTimeSeries.description: DEPRECATED End of time series. [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 13, bit 4]

MissingData.description: DEPRECATED Missing data. [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 14, bit 4]

TelemetrySyncError.description: DEPRECATED Telemetry synchronization error. [same as SEED 2.4 FDSH, field 14, bit 5]

ProvenanceURI.description: An identifier for a provenance description

DataQuality.description: Data quality indicator, use D, R, Q or M. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 2]

Sequence.description: Data record sequence number. [same as SEED 2.4 FSDH, field 1]
